XI.i.2.A.1.b
.
Actions the Philadelphia VSC Takes Upon Receipt of Notice of an In-Service Death
When the Philadelphia VSC receives notice of an in-service death, it
processes the first notice of death (NOD), unless a first NOD has already been processed
establishes an NOD folder, if needed, and
processes the initial claim for Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) upon receipt of
VA Form 21P-534EZ, Application for DIC, Survivors Pension, and/or Accrued Benefits
.
References
:  For more information on
establishing a folder during first NOD processing, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, 1.B.2.j
the jurisdiction of non-original in-service death claims received after the adjudication of the original claim, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 3.1.b
, and
in-service death claim labels for EP 130 and EP 140, see
M21-4, Appendix C
.
